name: More Than Meets The Eye
description:
An outcome of a game jam being held during https://www.gdays.sk/en/ in Trnava.  Theme which was given to the participants came to be (non)sense which supported the whole festival's focus on videogames created primarily for people with disabilities.  Teams could choose from three sub themes. Usage of mocaps, sound as a game mechanic and lastly, surrealism. We took the third option. 

Result was a bit creepy and surreal 2D platformer where we tried to portray each human sense whether as a game system or a simple mechanic. However we only managed to implement touch and sight in the end!

ps: Special thanks to Grand Beats and Stroon for creating very uncomforting collage of sound and music which made the game even more surreal.
